name: Fly By Night (susheelreddy87, Adit_patadiya)
description:
The story behind our game is that a small island city in the pacific has been

overrun by rebels that live on this island. You play as pilot James R. Owens, flying with
the US air forces special secret ops squadron. You were sent by your leader to take
care of this situation as covertly, and quickly as possible. You travel at night, in hopes to
surprise the enemy. But what was thought to be a covert mission is soon flipped on its
side when the enemy has expected your arrival. The city in ruin, and the enemy now
aware of your presence, you must act fast to liberate this once peaceful city. Avoiding
buildings destroyed by careless acts of violence, and rebels with a lot more fire power
then expected. How did they obtain this amount of weaponry? It looks almost like US
aircraft, and army issue missiles, so where did it come from? Soon realizing that you are
massively outnumbered, you call for backup, but wonder if it will ever come. As you fly
through this broken city, you realize you were sent into a suicide mission. This island
was intended to be taken by American forces, and you were its scapegoat into there
“failure” to liberate this city. So, survival is your only option. You must avoid being shot
down by enemy missiles and aircraft, while avoiding buildings in hope that survival will
bring salvation.
